targets.expr: (sum by(integration) (rate(cortex_alertmanager_notifications_total{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"}[$__rate_interval])) - sum by(integration) (rate(cortex_alertmanager_notifications_failed_total{juju_application=~"$juju_application",juju_model=~"$juju_model",juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid",juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"}[$__rate_interval]))) > 0 or on() vector(0)
